mapper.sql: A.UID AS UID,A.SAS_STOCK_NO AS SASSTOCKNO,A.CHG_TMS_CNT AS CHGTMSCNT,B.ATTR_NAME AS DCLTYPECD,A.SAS_DCL_NO AS SASDCLNO,C.ATTR_NAME AS EMAPVMARKNM, A.SAS_STOCK_PREENT_NO AS SASSTOCKPREENTNO,A.MASTER_CUSCD AS MASTERCUSCD,A.STOCK_TYPECD AS STOCKTYPECD,A.RLT_BOND_INVT_NO AS RLTBONDINVTNO, A.BUSINESS_TYPECD AS BUSINESSTYPECD,D.ATTR_NAME AS CENTRALIZEDDCLTYPECD,A.RLT_SAS_STOCK_NO AS RLTSASSTOCKNO,A.DCL_ER AS DCLER, A.DCL_TIME AS DCLTIME,A.PACKAGE_QTY AS PACKAGEQTY,A.GROSS_WT AS GROSSWT,A.NET_WT AS NETWT,A.PACK_TYPE AS PACKTYPE,A.LEVY_BL_AMT AS LEVYBLAMT, G.ATTR_NAME AS PASSTYPECD,F.ATTR_NAME AS PASSPORTUSEDTYPECD,A.STUCD AS STUCD,A.EMAPV_MARKCD AS EMAPVMARKCD,E.ATTR_NAME AS CHKSTATUSNM, A.EMAPV_DESCRIPTION AS EMAPVDESCRIPTION,A.OWNER_SYSTEM AS OWNERSYSTEM,A.RMK AS RMK,A.ETPS_PREENT_NO AS ETPSPREENTNO,A.COP_ENT_NO AS COPENTNO, A.AREA_CODE AS AREACODE,A.DOC_TYPE AS DOCTYPE,A.OPERATE_TYPE AS OPERATETYPE,A.BIZ_TYPE AS BIZTYPE,A.CHK_STATUS AS CHKSTATUS, A.RET_CHANNEL AS RETCHANNEL,A.DEC_TIME AS DECTIME,A.SEQ_NO AS SEQNO,A.CHK_TIME AS CHKTIME,A.DECLARE_MARK AS DECLAREMARK, A.INPUTER_CODE AS INPUTERCODE,A.INPUTER_NAME AS INPUTERNAME,A.INPUT_COP_NO AS INPUTCOPNO,A.INPUT_COP_NAME AS INPUTCOPNAME,A.CREATE_BY AS CREATEBY, A.CREATE_NAME AS CREATENAME,A.CREATE_TIME AS CREATETIME,A.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATEBY,A.UPDATE_NAME AS UPDATENAME,A.UPDATE_TIME AS UPDATETIME FROM SAS_STOCK_HIS A LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES B ON A.DCL_TYPECD=B.ATTR_VALUE AND B.DICTIONARY_VALUE='DCL_TYPECD_STOCK' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES C ON A.EMAPV_MARKCD=C.ATTR_VALUE AND C.DICTIONARY_VALUE='EMAPV_MARKCD_SAS' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES D ON A.CENTRALIZED_DCL_TYPECD=D.ATTR_VALUE AND D.DICTIONARY_VALUE='CENTRALIZED_DCL_TYPECD' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES E ON A.CHK_STATUS=E.ATTR_VALUE AND E.DICTIONARY_VALUE='CHK_STATUS' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES F ON A.PASSPORT_USED_TYPECD=F.ATTR_VALUE AND F.DICTIONARY_VALUE='PASSPORT_USED_TYPECD' LEFT JOIN BSSP_COD.COD_STD_CODES G ON A.PASS_TYPECD=G.ATTR_VALUE AND G.DICTIONARY_VALUE='PASS_TYPECD'
